alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Dougherty; Lee; Terrell; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 5:17PM EDT until August 15 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Lee County in southwestern Georgia... Northeastern Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Southern Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... West central Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 517 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Dawson, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Albany, East Albany, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Turner City, Walker, Sasser, Stocks, Radium Springs, Forrester, Lockett Crossing, South Albany, Southwest Ga Regional A/P, Palmyra, Clarks Mill, Dawson Municipal A/P, Chickasawhatchee, Bridges Crossroad, Century and Pecan City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
